attr.title: Star vs. the Game
attr.desc: Star vs. the Game is a cross between top-down beat-em up action and 2D platforming. Play as both Star and Marco and fight against a threat from beyond reality! The game features 7 levels with four bosses, as well as some extra content once the game is beaten.
attr.inst: Download game from https://rian-shinozaki.itch.io/star-vs-the-game , copy data.win, audiogroup1.dat and all .ogg files to /ports/starvsthegame/gamedata
